features: Interactive early learning toy with 2 pages of animals plus sounds and phrases that teach animal names and their sounds
Point arrow at animal picture and pull lever to find out its name and hear its sound
Quiz questions offer toddlers a chance to test their animal knowledge!
Point arrow to the music note to hear fun songs about the animals.
Helps strengthen fine motor skills for toddlers and preschool kids ages 18 months and older
body.description: From the farm and into the wild, the Little People World of Animals See 'n Say musical learning toy helps introduce toddlers to a variety of creatures in the animal kingdom. Toddlers can choose one of two pages, then point Eddie to an animal and pull the lever to discover its name and hear what it says! Fun songs and an interactive quiz mode enhance the learning play.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ​A wild adventure with every spin! ​Toddlers will have a blast exploring the animal kingdom with Eddie using their Little People World of Animals See 'n Say! Just point Eddie at an animal and pull the lever to hear that animal's name and the sound it makes! Flip the page to see (and hear) wild animals or farm animals. And when kids are in the mood for some tunes, point Eddie to the music note to hear "Old MacDonald" or another catchy sing-along song! ​Where fun & learning come together ​Spin the See 'n Say round and round to learn all about various animals, both down home on the farm and in far-away places around the world. And when kids are ready, test their knowledge with a super fun quiz mode! Point Eddie at the question mark to hear a quiz question and then point him to the answer. The more they play, the more they learn! ​See what develops ​The World of Animals See 'n Say is filled with exciting discoveries for little learners to explore. And it does more than just help kids learn about their animal friends. As toddlers make wondrous discoveries by spinning Eddie around and pulling the lever to hear exciting sounds and songs, their little hand muscles are getting a great workout!

Rock this parenting thing At Fisher-Price, we live to help parents feel more ready. From baby gear that makes new-parent life easier to fun toys that help entertain and teach your kids as they grow, we’ve been helping parents feel more confident about raising tiny humans for generations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two animal types to listen to
reviews.reviewText: An old toy with a twist! This toy has one setting that plays farm animals and an old McDonald song… the. You flip a page and all of a sudden you have jungle animals! What a fun idea! Kids love it and it is easy to use. Some kiddos may need help turning the page as it were… but once the kiddo is shown a few times - they can do it themselves. No volume control…. But it is not overly loud. Toy is recommended!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My granddaughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: My 18 month old granddaughter loves this gift. It's smaller than I thought, but that's probably a good thing since it's easy for her to handle. It provides lots of entertainment and is educational too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Had one when I was little!
reviews.reviewText: Overall it is a lot more smaller than what I had when I was little. The handle to pull down was hard for my granddaughter. The animal sounds are ok, but some of them don't sound like the animal. Overall ok for a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for our grandson and he loves it. He will mimic the animal noises. Great learning toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Animals See ‘N Say: fun learning toy for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: Animals See ‘N Say: fun learning toy for toddlers. Very cute. Grandson loves this toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Sound Of The Machine Is Kind Of Muffled And Low. The Pronounciation Of Some Of The Objects That It Says Is Incorrect. The Quality Of The Product Is Like A High End Cheap Material. Cheaply Made, But Slightly Better. Durability Of The Product Is About What You Would Expect For A Toddler Toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars See n say
reviews.reviewText: The good old classic toy that helps teach animals and sounds.The sound is clear and good to listen to.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really cute toy for the little ones in your life
reviews.reviewText: All of my children have received one of these toys when they were toddlers, so I decided to buy this for my nephew for christmas. It came quickly in the mail and is exactly what it is supposed to be. I recommend this product for its value and durability as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 15 month old Grandson as he loves to hear the sounds animals make.He also likes the 2 songs that the toy plays,the words change every time depending on what animal the arrow is pointing too Light enough that he can pick up and carry around himself but still sturdy.This toy has become one of his favourites.

Habe mich voll gefreut über das Tierkreisel.Ob die Tiere in Englisch oder Deutsch bezeichnet werden, war mir egal.Jedoch mein die "Kuh miau" und die "Katze Wau Wau" zb macht.Äh jaaa?? Brauch ich nichts mehr zu sagen!Sehr schade^
Muy bonito regalo para bebés, los sonidos no son fuertes así que no son molestos para los papás.
È un bel gioco ma è in inglese e Credevo fosse in italiano...bello lo stesso
